channel.title: respect on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in respect on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Tall man in Ueno station
item.description: 17:58 Thursday 27 July 2017 JST While I was walking out of Ueno station, a tall man and I did the foreigner nod and then he said he had seen me on TV (for being barefoot). We shook hands and talked for a bit about the importance of doing one’s own thing. He said, “I respect you,” and I should have said if he sees respectability in me, that means it’s in him, too.
